wikipedia_page.main: John Edwin Addenbrooke (4 January 1900 – 2 October 1961) was a footballer who played in the Football League for Chesterfield. He also played non-league football for Beighton, Frickley Colliery, Wath Athletic, Tinsley Working Mens Club and Fulwood.

response: * John Addenbrooke (philanthropist) (1680–1719), English doctor and benefactor of Addenbrooke's hospital
* John Addenbrooke (philanthropist) (1680–1719), English medical doctor and founder of Addenbrooke's Hospital
